https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Hannah and her son Leon flee from a war that has isolated their country. Trying to cross the border, they enter No Manâ€™s Land, a refugee camp that provides them with a bed and food, but will subject them to a severely oppressive system forcing them to compete to be able to stay at the camp. Claus, an old acquaintance, claims to know a secret about Hannah and Leon that, if brought to light, would endanger their lives. Another Frontier
